snippet: Bubba Watson’s adventurous style and his shot from the trees in a dramatic playoff Sunday produced a memorable Masters finish that could give golf a boost.
abstract: Karen Crouse On Golf column notes that Bubba Watson’s adventurous style and his shot from the trees in a dramatic playoff produced a memorable Masters finish that could give golf a boost; says his triumph is a victory for creativity and feel and fun.
lead_paragraph: Bubba Watson’s adventurous style and his shot from the trees in a dramatic playoff Sunday produced a memorable Masters finish that could give golf a boost.

headline.seo: 2012 Masters - Bubba Watson’s Title Is a Victory for Creativity and Golf
headline.main: Victory Built on Creativity and One Spectacular Shot
headline.print_headline: Unconventional Style, a Spectacular Shot, a Victory for Golf
